QuestData.Title: Doing Your Duty
QuestData.Description: Alright, $r. Here's the juice.$b$bIt works immediately, so don't use it until you're safely inside the outhouse.$b$bNow go get me those seeds!
QuestData.LogDescription: Anderhol in Amberpine Lodge wants you to take the Anderhol's Slider Cider and use the nearby outhouse to retrieve the Partially Processed Amberseeds.
QuestData.CompletionText: Got those seeds for me yet, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, $n? Everything come out okay?$b$bHmm, looks like we caught 'em just in time....
